snippet.title: Neversong - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Once upon a time there was a little boy named Peet who slept peacefully in a coma. When he opened his eyes, he found himself in a nightmare.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/733210/Neversong/
Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/neversong-switch/
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP0604-CUSA16527_00-ONCEUPONACOMAPS4
Xbox One: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/neversong/9p7xh5z6cgrk?activetab=pivot:overviewtab
GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/neversong
GameJolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/neversong/229681

Upon waking from a coma, Peet's girlfriend is nowhere to be found. Investigate the screams coming from the heart of Blackfork Asylum, the increasingly violent behavior of the grown-ups, and the strange truth about Peet's past in this hauntingly dreamlike fable.

Website: https://serenityforge.com/games/neversong/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SerenityForge
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SerenityForge/
